description: This is the main React component for a retro-themed Todo application. The App component manages the todo list state, executes side-effects like initial data fetch, and defines handlers for adding, toggling, editing, and deleting todos. It composes child components for the form and todo items, and supports optimistic UI updates.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component for the Todo app, manages state and handlers.

methods.name: handleAdd(text)
methods.description: Handles adding a new todo with optimistic update and error handling.

methods.name: handleToggle(id, completed)
methods.description: Handles toggling the completion state of a todo with rollback on failure.

methods.name: handleSave(id, text)
methods.description: Handles editing/saving the text of a todo with rollback on failure.

methods.name: handleDelete(id)
methods.description: Handles deletion of a todo with rollback on failure.
